channel.title: 'javac' is not a recongnized command
channel.description:
this is my second time posting something like this, but im having trouble compiling on my vps, i downloaded jdk and whatever, installed its in my java folder :P
and i set an enviromental variable with pic attached.
and if i do run.bat it works... :S please help me compile, and i have my server in dropbox, but when i try to compile i get the same message...
edited with attachment pic..

item.title: 'javac' is not a recongnized command
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

You have to edit the PATH environmental variable and add…

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin

Read full topic
